mapper.insert: insert into stock(id, stock_name, stock_market, stock_sector, stock_industry) values(#{id}, #{stockName}, #{stockMarket}, #{stockSector}, #{stockIndustry})
mapper.select: select id, stock_name, stock_sector, stock_industry, stock_market from stock where id like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or stock_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or stock_sector like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select id, stock_name, stock_sector, stock_industry, stock_market from stock where ${tag} like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
